definition[0]: to go back in the direction you came from, or to make someone or something do this
example[0]: It’s getting late – maybe we should turn back.
example[1]: The UN convoy was turned back at the border.
definition[1]: to return to doing something in the way it was done before
example[2]: We’ve promised to help, and there’s no turning back (=you cannot change this)!
example[3]: The people are turning back to natural resources to survive.
